overview: Ismail and Rohani's life became happier when the price of rubber as their source of income increased. In addition, their eldest daughter Rosnah got an offer to study at a boarding school. They work harder for their daughter's education. Rohani advises her daughter not to spend money to come home during Ramadan as they need to save for Hari Raya preparations. Fortunately, Rosnah's roommate felt sorry for her friend and invited her to her house. Mahayu's parents were shocked when they met Rosnah because Rosnah was their long-lost relative.
title: Mak Tak Bagi Balik
